member.name: T:System.Net.ServerSentEvents.SseParser

member.name: F:System.Net.ServerSentEvents.SseParser.EventTypeDefault
member.summary: The default ("message") for an event that did not explicitly specify a type.

member.name: M:System.Net.ServerSentEvents.SseParser.Create(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a parser for parsing a of server-sent events into a sequence of values.
member.param: The stream containing the data to parse.
member.returns: The enumerable of strings, which may be enumerated synchronously or asynchronously. The strings are decoded from the UTF8-encoded bytes of the payload of each event.

member.returns: The enumerable, which may be enumerated synchronously or asynchronously.
